{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Cover Fossil |image = [[File:Cover_Fossil.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Cover Fossil''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Cover Fossil''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When a Cover Fossil is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Tirtouga. ==Mine Layout== The Cover Fossil appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:CoverFossilMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Cover_Fossil.png|30px]] || [[File:Tirtouga.png|40px]] Tirtouga |} ==Acquisition== Cover Fossils can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Relic Castle|0|100 Clears}} {{LootItem|Glittering Cave|0.5}} |} |}
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]] __NOTOC__
